basics.name: environment
basics.label: Environment
basics.toolTip: Provide an environment name that will be used in resource names and tagging. Min 3, max 20

constraints.validationMessage: Environment must start with an alphanumeric character and can contain alphanumeric or hyphen characters, and must be between 3 and 20 characters in length

elements.name: adminUsername
elements.label: User name
elements.toolTip: Specify a user for accessing the virtual machines within your cluster. Must be a valid CentOS username

constraints.validationMessage: Username must not be a reserved CentOS username

elements.name: p4SSHSource
elements.label: SSH public key source
elements.defaultValue: Use existing key stored in Azure
elements.toolTip: Specify the SSH key source for P4 server.

allowedValues.label: Use existing key stored in Azure

elements.name: adminExistKey
elements.label: Azure Stored Keys
elements.toolTip: Select key pair stored in Azure.

toolTip.authenticationType: Choose Authentication type Password or PublicKey(SSH).
toolTip.password: Enter the password for the specified user name.

constraints.customValidationMessage: The value must not be empty.

subLabel.preValidation: Configure the virtual network's resources and settings

elements.name: ipRangeToPermitFrom
elements.label: IP range to Permit from
elements.toolTip: Input your public IP address in CIDR notation. Example: 162.244.43.80/32. Use a service like whatismyipaddress.com to find your public IP address.

constraints.validationMessage: IP range must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x
